TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool DecomposeDelegate(UnicodeFunctions ufuncs, uint ab, out uint a, out uint b);
.class public auto ansi sealed DecomposeDelegate extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The Unicode code point to decompose.
When this method returns, contains the first component of the decomposition.
When this method returns, contains the second component of the decomposition.
Docs.summary: A callback delegate used to decompose a Unicode code point into two code points using Unicode canonical decomposition.
Docs.returns: if the code point was successfully decomposed; otherwise, .
